author: sky.cactus
content: The EIPs repository has a pretty severe spam problem.  The most effective thing you can do is report them.  GitHub does actually delete spam accounts.

author: sky.cactus
content: I believe the reason they do it is so they can have a GitHub profile that shows up as connected to Ethereum core development, and then they use that profile as part of a scam.

author: sky.cactus
content: Essentially they are trying to fake reputation farm.

author: sky.cactus
content: I deal with and report many such accounts every day.
